summary: Comprehensive testing of enhanced liquor sales dashboard completed successfully. All new advanced charting features, smart demand recommendations, and Excel export functionality are working perfectly. Backend APIs are 100% functional with all new endpoints operational. Frontend displays all 5 tabs with advanced charts (volume leaders, revenue leaders, velocity leaders, revenue proportion pie chart) and smart recommendations with bottle quantities and urgency levels. Excel export generates 3-column format as requested.
passed_tests: Backend API root endpoint (200 OK)
File upload with valid Excel data (5 records uploaded)
Analytics endpoint with multiple multiplier values
Brands endpoint returning all brand data
Charts data endpoint with volume_leaders, velocity_leaders, revenue_leaders, revenue_proportion
Demand recommendations endpoint with bottle quantities and urgency levels
Excel export endpoint with proper 3-column format (Index, Brand Name, Demand Quantity)
CORS configuration working
All 5 tabs navigation (Sales Trends, Performance Charts, Overstocking Alerts, Top Brands, Recommendations)
Volume Leaders bar chart displaying top brands by quantity sold
Revenue Leaders bar chart displaying top brands by sales revenue with proper formatting
Velocity Leaders (Fastest Moving) display showing brands with highest sales velocity
Revenue Proportion pie chart showing contribution to total sales
Smart demand recommendations with bottle quantity calculations
Urgency levels (HIGH, MEDIUM, LOW) properly displayed with color coding
Rate per bottle calculations and display
Excel export functionality with correct filename format (liquor_demand_list_YYYYMMDD.xlsx)
Chart responsiveness with ResponsiveContainer implementation
Chart tooltip functionality working on hover
Urgency level summary cards (High Priority: 0, Medium Priority: 1, Low Priority: 1)
Bottle quantities displayed in recommendations (233 bottles, 240 bottles, etc.)
Currency formatting with Indian Rupee symbol (â‚¹)
All data-testid attributes present for automated testing
action_item_for_E1: No action items required. All requested features are implemented and working correctly. The enhanced liquor sales dashboard with advanced charts, smart demand recommendations, and 3-column Excel export is fully functional and ready for production use.
